text:
Mechanisms of action of #hydroxychloroquine & #chloroquine

➡️Inhibit MHC class II expression, antigen presentation & immune activation
➡️Inhibit production of pro-inflammatory cytokines: IL-1, IL-6, IFNα, TNF

👉🏽https://t.co/mBcURqCA4x
via @NatRevRheumatol 

#arthritis #lupus https://t.co/VNlK2FvpCT
